mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, B.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE boardnum>0 ORDER BY boardnum DESC ) B ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARDNUM, BOARDNAME, BOARDCONTENTS, BOARDWRITER, BOARDDATE, BOARDHIT) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardName}, #{boardContents}, #{boardWriter}, SYSDATE, 0)
